channel.title: REM on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in REM on Joost Plattel

item.title: First nights with the Zeo sleep monitor
item.description: During the QS Conference the awesome guys from Zeo gifted me one of their sleep monitors. And 1 week ago it arrived by mail. I promised to create as much value in return if I liked the Zeo.Â And I do, I absolutely do. Here is why: As an average person sleep 8 hours a day you spend 1/3 of your life lying in bed... That's a lot of time spend.
